description:
# [1.13.1](https://github.com/nvbangg/nvbangg-patches/compare/v1.13.0...v1.13.1) 
- Increase playback speed step from 0.15 to 0.25 
- Simplify the default custom playback speeds to [1.0, 1.25, 1.5, 2.0, 2.5]
- Comment out adding the "morphe_disable_layout_updates" preference in ChangeFormFactorPatch
